get_started.heading: Welcome Students!
get_started.desc:
We are glad that you have signed-up to this program and joined us in this exciting journey of nurturing an experience of learning, skilling and innovation for the young people. As you are aware you will be playing a role of student for the participants in their learning journey.

This portal gives you an experience of learning modules and important resources for supporting the participants. You can also register and track progress of your teams using the dashboard.

Your journey as a teacher/mentor will involve the following key milestones:

  • Step-1: Take Pre-Survey
  • Step-2: Complete the course and reading material
  • Step-3: Register the teams
  • Step-4: Support the participants in completing the learning journey.
  • Step-5: Support the participants in challenge/idea submission.
  • Step-6: Complete the post survey.

We hope you and your teams will have a great learning experience and wish you all the best for this program!

teacher_get_started.heading: Welcome Guide Teacher!
teacher_get_started.desc:
We are delighted that you have signed up for this program and have joined us on this journey of nurturing problem solving and innovation in youth. As you are already aware, you will be playing the role of a guide teacher to the students for the duration of the course.

The portal includes various information modules and resources that will help you and your students on their learning journeys.

Your journey as a guide teacher will include the following key milestones

  1. Register yourself on the portal and take the pre-survey.
  2. Understand the program and the tech platform.
  3. Identify teams and register them on the portal.
  4. Arrange access to digital devices for students.
  5. Support the students on their learning journey.
  6. Ensure teams submit their final ideas on the portal.
  7. Complete the post survey.
  8. Download teacher’s certificate.
  9. Instruct and support the students to download student certificates.

We hope you and the students have a great time doing this program.

We wish you all the best!

student_get_started.heading: Welcome Students!
student_get_started.desc:
We are glad that you are part of this program and have joined us in this exciting journey of learning, skilling and innovation. There are many exciting things awaiting you in this journey.

You will learn through this platform, work with your team and be supported by your teachers as well.

Your journey as a participant will involve the following key steps:

  • Step 1: Take Pre-Survey

  • Step 2: Start the course by watching the video.

  • Step 3: Complete each module and attempt the Quiz.

  • Step 4: Work with your team on the worksheets in each module to complete your own problem solving journey.

  • Step 5: Submit your team’s final idea.

  • Step 6: Complete the post survey.

We hope you and your teams will have a great learning experience and wish you all the best for this program!
student_get_started.pre: Thank you for completing the Pre-Survey. Your responses are important for us to get to know you.

student.worksheet:
Dear Student,

The workbook is a set of activity sheets that will help you do the course, understand and practice your problem solving journey better. They are based on the concepts you learnt in the videos and are expected to do it as a team. Every team will have a workbook.

Step-1: While it is good to have a printed workbook, it is not compulsory to take a print out. In case you do not have a printed workbook, you can refer to the workbook on a digital device and write down the page number and question number and then answer the questions in notebooks / papers.

Step-2:After watching the videos, discuss the concepts you learnt and the related module workbook pages with your team before you start to do the workbook. (Remember that Workbook is a Team Activity, not individual task)

Step-3:Keep these pages safely Or Suggest to hand it over to your guide teacher after the completion of your course as you will need it during the idea submission

Hope you and your team learn new things and enjoy completing this workbook.

student_course.idea_submission_date_com_desc: Dear Students, the final date for idea submission is completed. Please complete your course and  post survey.
student_course.cong_msg_menu:
🎉 Congratulations on completing the course! 🎉

You did it! Your dedication and hard work have brought you to this exciting milestone. We are incredibly proud of your achievement and the effort you've put into the program.

This accomplishment marks just the beginning of your journey. The knowledge you've gained will be a valuable asset as you move forward in the program. Remember, learning is a lifelong adventure, and you've proven your ability to thrive in it.

We can't wait to see all the amazing Ideas you & your team are going to submit.
student_course.quiz_inst_msg:
Now that you have watched some videos, learnt new concepts, discussed them with your team and teacher and practiced them using the workbook, it's time to check how much you have understood.

Instructions:
  1. Read and understand the question carefully before answering.
  2. Quiz will consist of 10-15 questions and will take 5-10 minutes to complete.
  3. Score will be displayed at the end of the quiz for your reference.
  4. You need to get at least 60% i.e., at least answer 6-8 questions correctly to move to the next module and unlock the videos.
  5. You can retake the quiz again if you score less than 60%.
student_course.idea_ins_note:
Congratulations to you and your team!

For successfully completing the course and starting the idea submission. As you are getting ready to submit your idea, remember these important things to make sure you do it well:

Step-1:Go through Idea submission Process video in Resources section. Discuss with all your team members and the guide teacher to select the final idea for submission.

Step-2: Write down your idea on a paper or notebook before you start submitting it on the website.

Step-3: Fill the form carefully and ensure you double-check everything before you save or submit your idea. Do not forget to ask your guide teacher to go through the details entered by you to make sure they are correct.

Note: You cannot make changes once the idea is submitted. Invalid/Wrong entries will not be selected.

Details to keep ready before you proceed to submit your idea:

  • Choose the Sustainable Development Goal (SDG) as per the selected problem which will appear in the next screen.
  • Write down the Current State, Desired State, Effects and Causes of the selected problem.
  • Write down Idea Name & its descriptions clearly. Idea name should convey the uniqueness of your solution.
  • Make note of user feedback to your idea which helped improve your solution.
  • List materials you’ll need to make a working model & gather images & videos related to your prototype/design if you have done the Make & test process to upload during Idea submission.

Go ahead and submit your idea! Wish you All the best 👍
student_course.my_cer_note:
👏🏻 Congratulations on successfully completing the course and submitting the idea 🥳

We wish you All the best 👍& hope you and your team will continue this journey of exploring the world around, learning new things, working together & spreading joy😃
